#text=my sister Jane and I love to go bicycling .
#text=One warm day in June , we wanted to go out and ride but my bike had a flat tire .
#text=I carefully took the tire off of the rim and then inflated it with a hand pump so I could find the leak .
#text=A blast of cool air on my fingers led me to the problem : a single round hole , probably caused by a nail or other sharp object .
#text=I got out my patch kit , and Jane held up the tire for me as I first applied glue and then placed a patch carefully over the damaged area .
#text=I had to let it dry , so we took turns riding Jane 's bike for a while .
#text=Then I inflated the tire and checked the patch .
#text=I put the tire back on my bike and we went off on a nice long ride .
#text=I was happy to have my bike fixed again .
